collection:
This privacy policy ("Policy") explains how we collect, use,
share, disclose and protect your Personal Information (defined below), when
you (“you” or “Users) visit and/or download the Platform and/or use the
Services (as the case may be).

YOU HEREBY CONSENT TO OUR COLLECTION,
USE, SHARING, AND DISCLOSURE OF YOUR INFORMATION AND INFORMATION OF AN END
CUSTOMER AS DESCRIBED IN THIS POLICY.

IF YOU USE THE SERVICES ON BEHALF OF SOMEONE ELSE OR AN ENTITY
(SUCH AS YOUR EMPLOYER), YOU REPRESENT THAT YOU ARE AUTHORISED BY SUCH
INDIVIDUAL OR ENTITY TO (I) ACCEPT THIS POLICY ON SUCH INDIVIDUAL’S OR
ENTITY’S BEHALF; AND (II) CONSENT ON BEHALF OF SUCH INDIVIDUAL OR ENTITY TO
OUR COLLECTION, USE AND DISCLOSURE OF SUCH INDIVIDUAL’S OR ENTITY’S
INFORMATION AS DESCRIBED IN THIS POLICY.

Aasaan will collect and process your personal and third-party data carefully,
only for the purposes described in this Policy and only to the extent
necessary as defined herein and within the scope of the applicable legal
regulations.

This Policy describes the types of information Aasaan collects, why and how
Aasaan uses the information, with whom Aasaan shares it, and the choices you
can make about Aasaan’s use of the information.
Aasaan limits the collection of Personal Information of the User and/or the End Customer to that which is necessary for its intended purpose.

2. Business Information: Business Information means any information that may be used to identify an individual’s business, including but not limited to the name and address of the entity, date of incorporation, e-mail address of the entity, contact information of the registered office, company identification number (CIN), financial information including bank account details, PAN details, names of the directors and such other information (hereinafter referred to as “Business Information”).

Non-Personal Information: Non-personal information means information that does not specifically identify an individual or business, but includes information from you, such as your browser type, the URL of the previous websites you visited, your Internet Service Provider (ISP), operating system and your Internet Protocol (IP) address.

Aasaan may gather any non-personal information regarding how many people visit the Platform, the User Domain, the pages they visit, their IP address, and the type of browser they use while visiting the Platform and/or User Domain and locations, operating systems, applications installed on your device, device ID, device manufacturer and type, device, connection information, screen resolution, usage statistics, default communication applications and other technology on the devices you use to access the Platform and/or User Domain, maximum products purchased by the End Customer.

Such information shall also include all such Personal Information collected and stored by Aasaan that undergoes the process of de-identification and is no more identifiable to you or any natural person (hereinafter referred to as “Non-Personal Information”).
Aasaan may also collect Non-Personal Information that you voluntarily provide, such as information included in response to a questionnaire or a survey conducted by Aasaan.

Usage Information: Usage Information includes without limitation all data and information collected automatically through the Platform and/or User Domain (or through the third party analytics service providers), by use and access of the Platform and/or User Domain in the nature of system administrative data, statistical and demographical data, and operational information and data generated by or characterizing use of the Platform and/or User Domain including without limitation Non-Personal Information, cookies, Platform/User Domain traffic, time spent on the Platform/ User Domain, number of visits to the Platform/ User Domain and other similar information and behaviour indicating the mode and manner of use of the Platform/User Domain (hereinafter referred to as the “Usage Information”).

**REGISTRATION, COLLECTION, AND USE OF INFORMATION**

  

    1.

Registration and Information you provide:

When you access the Platform, you are required to register to use the
Services.

To provide you the Services, we must collect such Personal
Information and other information as may be informed to you at the time of
registration by Aasaan from time to time.

Non-Personal Information and Usage Information we collect:

When you visit, download, and/or use any of our Services and/or the User
Domain, we may collect certain Non-Personal Information and Usage Information,
including, without limitation, information about your and the End Customer’s
device hardware and software that is automatically collected by us when you
and/or the End Customer download, access, and use the Platform and/or User
Domain (as applicable).

The Platform also may access metadata and other
information associated with other files stored on your or the End Customer’s
device.

This may include both Personal and Non-Personal Information like
photographs, personal contacts, address book information, etc.

Information we collect from other sources:

We may receive Personal Information about you and/or the End Customer from
third-party sources, such as ( social media platforms, when you log in or
sign-up on the Platform using your social media account or the End Customers
log in or sign-up on the User Doman (as applicable), we may receive Personal
Information from that service (e.g., your username, basic profile Personal
Information) and in some cases, we may collect Personal Information from lead
enhancement companies which help us to improve our service offering; (iii)
advertising and marketing partners to monitor, manage and measure our ad
campaigns.

Information collected by Aasaan from a particular browser or device
may be used with another computer or device that is linked to the browser or
device on which such information was collected.

This information we collect is used by us to: (i) operate the services and
provide the services (including those subscribed by the Users); (ii) deliver
personalized services; (iii) expand and improve the quality of the service;
(iv) provide general aggregated statistical data regarding the use of our
services; (v) analyze our performance and marketing activities; (vi) improve
data security and fraud prevention; and (vii) comply with applicable laws and
regulations.

If you access or use any
third-party site through our Platform, Aasaan would like to inform you that
any information that you provide or that is collected by such a third-party
site will be governed by the terms of their own privacy policy and not this
Policy.

If you do not want us to collect
this information, do not download it or delete it from your device.

**END CUSTOMERS’ PERSONAL INFORMATION**

  

We collect, store and process certain Personal Information of End Customers
(“End Customers’ Personal Information'') solely for and on our Users’ behalf
and to facilitate the provision of Services to the Users via.

For example, each of our Users is able to import their e-mail contacts from
third-party services like Gmail or otherwise collect and manage contacts via.

Such contacts are then stored with Aasaan on the User’s
behalf.

You are solely responsible for notifying your End Customers of the collection,
processing, and use of their Information and informing them that their
information will be transferred to and processed by Aasaan on your behalf.

**USE OF COOKIES**

  

Our third-party service providers and we use cookies, google analytics, web
beacons, and other similar technologies in order to provide our Services and
ensure that it performs correctly, to analyze our performance and marketing
activities, and to personalize your experience.

Our third-party service
providers and we may use Google Analytics, which transmits website traffic
data to Google servers located anywhere in the world.

We use reports provided by Google Analytics to help us
understand website traffic and Platform usage.

**STORING OF PERSONAL INFORMATION**

  

Personal Information provided by you or collected from you and/or the End
Customers may be stored in data centres located anywhere in the world.

**SECURITY**

  

Aasaan may transfer your Personal Information and submitted content like
images and business information uploaded by you the Platform collects from you
to our servers located in India for processing and storing.

Aasaan reserves the right to verify and authenticate your identity and your
account information in order to ensure accurate delivery of Services.

We may store Non-Personal Information and Usage Information received by us in
perpetuity, provided such storage and retention is in accordance with
applicable law.

Please be aware that any Personal Information you provide in any such
areas may be read, collected, and used by others who access them.

Aasaan does not intentionally or knowingly collect Personal
Information through the Platform and/or User Domain from anyone under that
age.

Aasaan encourages parents and guardians to be involved in the online
activities of minors to ensure that no Personal Information is collected from
a minor without their prior consent.
Also, opting out of the Platform’s collection of location information will cause only its location-based features to be disabled.

share, disclose and protect your Personal Information (defined below), when
you (“you” or “Users) visit and/or download the Platform and/or use the
Services (as the case may be).

YOU HEREBY CONSENT TO OUR COLLECTION,
USE, SHARING, AND DISCLOSURE OF YOUR INFORMATION AND INFORMATION OF AN END
CUSTOMER AS DESCRIBED IN THIS POLICY.

IF YOU USE THE SERVICES ON BEHALF OF SOMEONE ELSE OR AN ENTITY
(SUCH AS YOUR EMPLOYER), YOU REPRESENT THAT YOU ARE AUTHORISED BY SUCH
INDIVIDUAL OR ENTITY TO (I) ACCEPT THIS POLICY ON SUCH INDIVIDUAL’S OR
ENTITY’S BEHALF; AND (II) CONSENT ON BEHALF OF SUCH INDIVIDUAL OR ENTITY TO
OUR COLLECTION, USE AND DISCLOSURE OF SUCH INDIVIDUAL’S OR ENTITY’S
INFORMATION AS DESCRIBED IN THIS POLICY.

This Policy describes the types of information Aasaan collects, why and how
Aasaan uses the information, with whom Aasaan shares it, and the choices you
can make about Aasaan’s use of the information.

**SHARING/DISCLOSING PERSONAL INFORMATION**

  

We may share or disclose Non-Personal Information about you and/or the End
Customer that does not identify any individual or device without restriction.

We may share Personal Information that we collect or you provide or disclose
to us with our parent company, subsidiaries and affiliates, contractors,
service providers, and other third-party service providers we use to support
our business activities and who are bound by contractual obligations to keep
such Personal Information confidential and use it only for the purposes for
which we disclose it to them in accordance with this Policy.

We may disclose
your Information with your consent to third parties to market their products
or services and for any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the
Information.

We may disclose the Personal Information shared with us, with or without
notice, only if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such
action is necessary to (a) conform to the edicts of the law or comply with the
legal process served on us; (b) protect and defend our rights or property and
Platform; and, (c) act under exigent circumstances to protect the personal
safety of users of our Platform, or the public.

You hereby agree that you
have obtained explicit written authorization and consent from all such End
Customers without any coercion, whose information you will be sharing with
Aasaan.

You are solely responsible for notifying your End Customers of the collection,
processing, and use of their Information and informing them that their
information will be transferred to and processed by Aasaan on your behalf.

Once you withdraw
your consent to share the Personal Information collected by Aasaan, Aasaan
shall have the option not to fulfil the purposes for which the said Personal
Information was sought and Aasaan may restrict you from using the services on
the Platform and/or the User Domain.

Please be aware that any Personal Information you provide in any such
areas may be read, collected, and used by others who access them.

1. BUSINESS TRANSITION

  

In case Aasaan undergoes a business transition, such as a merger, acquisition
by another company, to or the sale of a portion of its assets, the Personal
Information shared with us will, in most instances, be part of the assets
transferred.

You acknowledge that such transfers may occur and are permitted
by this Policy and that any acquirer of ours or that acquirer’s assets may
continue to process the Personal Information as set forth in this Policy.

Aasaan is not responsible for any actions or inactions of any third parties
that receive your Information.
